info.narration: #0 is on their way to $0’s Containment Unit to begin the work process.

collection.name: Fairy Festival
collection.openText: Everything will be peaceful while you are under the fairies' care.

specialTipSize.specialTip: When the work result was Normal or Good, small fairies appeared around the employee.
The small fairies will heal the employee’s HP over a limited time.
If an employee under the fairies' care is assigned to a different Containment Unit, they will immediately die and be consumed by the fairies.
